nodes.text: Thannt was a location in the galaxy that housed at least one biofarm. At some point after escaping Jedha and getting involved in a scuffle on Tatooine, Doctor Cornelius Evazan infiltrated the biofarm, stealing a pluripleq which he would use to disguise himself as a shapeshifter named "Lopset Yas".

Eventually, the bounty hunter Tam Posla learned about Evazan's infiltration of the biofarm, and on the 421st day of his hunt for Evazan, recounted events he knew Evazan had been involved in. He then added that Evazan's trail had been cold for a month and that his ego hadn't kept him off-grid for as long before, leading Posla to believe Evazan was either dead or incarcerated.
